Royal Davui Island Resort Royal Davui Island Resort is an exclusive sanctuary among adults only resorts in Fiji, offering a level of Fijian barefoot luxury, elegance, and privacy not found in larger resorts. Situated in Fiji's breathtaking Beqa Lagoon, this adults-only island is the epitome of tranquility and beauty. Your luxuriously designed bungalow or villa offers a perfect blend of modern Fijian architecture, complimented with a unique open-air shower, an air-conditioned sleeping pavilion, and a private plunge pool. As a premier adults-only island in Fiji, Royal Davui is the ideal tropical island escape for an island vacation, honeymoon, offering an intimate and exclusive experience that defines the essence of Fijian barefoot luxury.
